title: The Enduring wilderness
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/National parks and reserves - Canada
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection - Citizen participation

Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/National parks and reserves - Canada
description: A scenic tour of Canada's national parks, from the mountains of British Columbia to the seaswept shores of Newfoundland. Besides the beauty of the unspoiled wilderness (and there is much of that), you see also the farsightedness of those who in the past century, set aside these territories for the enjoyment of future generations.
